'''Bonniejean Christensen''', Ph.D. was Professor of English at the [[wikipedia:University of North Dakota|University of North Dakota]].

==Bibliography==
===Dissertation===
* [[1969]]: ''Beowulf and The Hobbit: Elegy Into Fantasy in J.R.R. Tolkien's Creative Technique'' (Ph.D. dissertation)
===Articles===
* [[1970]]: ''Bulletin of Bibliography''
** (Julyâ€“September, #3): "J.R.R. Tolkien: A Bibliography"
* [[1973]]: ''[[Orcrist (journal)|Orcrist]]'' #7
** "Tolkien's Creative Technique: ''Beowulf'' and ''The Hobbit''"
* [[1975]]: ''[[A Tolkien Compass]]'' (edited by [[Jared Lobdell]])
** "Gollum's Character Transformation in ''The Hobbit''"
* [[1978]]: ''[[Tolkien Scrapbook]]'' (edited by [[Alida Becker]])
** "A Tolkien Bibiliography"
===Reviews===
* [[1969]]: [[Tolkien Journal (Vol.3, No.4)|''Tolkien Journal'' (Vol.3, No.4)]]
** "A Ready Answer" (review of [[William Ready]]'s ''[[The Tolkien Relation]]'')
